column20: this pair of distortion free women& rsquo s sunglasses from fastrack& rsquo s denim collection comes in a styled frame. An eclectic mixture of fashion and substance
column21:
its shape provides that perfect Fit over the root of your nose. The glasses come with a sturdy case and a puck which doubles as a storage and wiping cloth for the accessory.

Pilkington UV 415 tinted glass lens for 100% UV 400 protection
Stylised plastic frame in an aerodynamic design for absolute comfort and durability
Square lens for absolute style and protection from elements
Flexible hinges for durability
Fixed nose holder with a thick nose bridge which is part of the frame to hold the glasses in place
column22:
ensuring there is no friction with the skin

Care
Remove dust and grime by gently wiping the lens with the cloth provided
Remove oil or tough stains with the help of a lens cleaner
Do not use your fingers on such stains
Do not place glasses on uneven surface or heated areas like the dashboard of a car



Warranty: 1 Year
